amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert language prohibiting use of funds to enforce section 120 of the bill which relates to trafficking of ivory from African elephants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce section 120 of this Act, with respect to Ivory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 405).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 405).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
